医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
前往接受治疗：三分之一的 NHS 乳腺癌患者绕过当地中心最新研究表明，当选择在哪里接受手术治疗时，近三分之一通过英格兰国家医疗服务体系 (NHS) 接受治疗的乳腺癌患者选择绕过最近的中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Traveling-for-treatment-One-third-of-NHS-breast-cancer-病人-bypass-local-center.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Traveling-for-treatment-One-third-of-NHS-breast-cancer-患者-bypass-local-center.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcf40784-4618-461c-a80e-aaf49fc819ec Thu, 11 Jan 2024 20:06:53 -0500 Traveling for treatment: One-third of NHS breast cancer patients bypass local center
英国孕产妇死亡率创20年来新高MBRRACE-UK 合作调查英国孕产妇死亡的最新数据显示，怀孕期间或怀孕后不久死亡的妇女死亡率已上升至 2003 年 5 月以来的最高水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/UKs-maternal-mortality-rate-hits-20-year-high.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/UKs-maternal-mortality-rate-hits-20-year-high.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64928516-f112-41ba-8f57-9add605c1340 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 20:00:43 -0500 UK's maternal mortality rate hits 20-year high
牛津大学启动 ChAdOx1 NipahB 疫苗的首次人体试验牛津大学启动了一项新的临床试验，以测试一种疫苗，以保护人们免受致命的尼帕病毒的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/University-of-Oxford-launches-first-in- human-trial-of-the-ChAdOx1-NipahB-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/University-of-Oxford-launches-first-in- human-trial-of-the-ChAdOx1-NipahB-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=919c217f-8bb6-4212-9463-467d34a5acec Thu, 11 Jan 2024 19:56:18 -0500 University of Oxford launches first-in-human trial of the ChAdOx1 NipahB vaccine
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：关于（政府）资助随着这个选举年的正式开始，国会通过法案变得更加困难，国会山的立法者仍在努力为去年十月开始的财政年度的政府提供资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-All-about-the-(government)-funding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-All-about-the-(government)-funding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40e8b4f4-9dd2-4ca3-b74d-a49608025724 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 19:49:48 -0500 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': All about the (government) funding
在一场激烈的重播中，共和党的竞争对手海莉和德桑蒂斯就医疗保健问题展开了辩论。特朗普袖手旁观。周三晚上，美国有线电视新闻网 (CNN) 在爱荷华州得梅因德雷克大学主办共和党总统辩论，主题是赢得即将到来的爱荷华州预选会议。领跑者唐纳德·特朗普再次缺席，只有另外两名候选人晋级：佛罗里达州州长罗恩·德桑蒂斯和前南卡罗来纳州州长妮基·黑利。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/In-a-fratious-rerun-GOP-rivals-Haley-and-Desantis-debate-health-care-Trump-sits-it-out.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/In-a-fratious-rerun-GOP-rivals-Haley-and-Desantis-debate-health-care-Trump-sits-it-out.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40840661-a600-4c72-b285-1d3bd6911a76 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 19:45:50 -0500 In a fractious rerun, GOP rivals Haley and Desantis debate health care. Trump sits it out.
延长肝脏保存技术为日间移植带来希望II 期临床试验评估了延长 DHOPE 将人类供体肝脏保存时间延长至 20 小时的安全性和可行性，显示出促进日间肝移植的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Extended-liver-preservation-technique-shows-promise-for-daytime-transplants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Extended-liver-preservation-technique-shows-promise-for-daytime-transplants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f041cae-f54f-4da5-aee8-522f92ad1d21 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 18:57:00 -0500 Extended liver preservation technique shows promise for daytime transplants
发现调节棕色脂肪生长的关键蛋白 EPAC1，具有治疗肥胖的潜力研究表明，EPAC1 蛋白在调节棕色和米色脂肪组织的生长中发挥着至关重要的作用，为治疗肥胖和改善心脏代谢健康提供了潜在途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Key- Protein-EPAC1-found-to-regulate-brown-fat-growth-offering-obesity-treatment-pottial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Key- Protein-EPAC1-found-to-regulate-brown-fat-growth-offering-obesity-treatment-potial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a474035-4987-4bcb-86b8-91d9517b8180 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 18:49:00 -0500 Key protein EPAC1 found to regulate brown fat growth, offering obesity treatment potential
童年创伤、述情障碍和长期吸烟之间是否存在神经生物学关联？发表在《美国医学会杂志》网络公开版上的一项新研究探讨了童年创伤导致的情绪调节失败所带来的吸烟风险，以及反映这些风险因素的神经测量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Is-there-a-neurobiological-association- Between-childhood-trauma-alexithymia-and-long-term-nicotine-smoking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Is-there-a-neurobiological-association- Between-childhood-trauma-alexithymia-and-long-term-nicotine-smoking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80223171-cec2-47b6-abc3-d51600aaa2c4 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 18:39:00 -0500 Is there a neurobiological association between childhood trauma, alexithymia, and long-term nicotine smoking?
革命性的血液测试可监测大脑中的基因表达动态大脑是身体中最受保护的器官，被复杂且几乎无法穿透的特殊血管屏障包裹着。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Revolutionary-blood-test-monitors-gene-express-dynamics-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Revolutionary-blood-test-monitors-gene-express-dynamics-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7b64e31-55e0-447a-8cfa-91e7f8aab88e Thu, 11 Jan 2024 14:23:07 -0500 Revolutionary blood test monitors gene expression dynamics in the brain
人工智能考试提高了青少年糖尿病眼部筛查率约翰·霍普金斯儿童中心对患有糖尿病的儿童和青少年进行的一项研究得出的结论是，所谓的自主人工智能 (AI) 糖尿病眼科检查可显着提高旨在预防潜在致盲糖尿病眼病 (DED) 的筛查完成率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/AI-exam-boosts-diabetic-eye-screening-rates-in-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/AI-exam-boosts-diabetic-eye-screening-rates-in-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77cfb51e-003c-463a-8edb-b935d46abe22 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 11:25:15 -0500 AI exam boosts diabetic eye screening rates in youth
